DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from the Symantec Gateway IDS.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.format: Ascend Reboot Sequence DoS Attack Detected
BootP Service Remote Execution Attempt Detected
Remote Password List Access Attempt Detected
UPnP NOTIFY Buffer Overflow Attempt Detected
Cisco IOS Unusual Protocol DoS Attack Detected
AIX FTPd Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
BFTP Site Chown Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
WU-FTPd Site Exec Overflow Attack Detected
Son of Cache Cow Attack Detected
Typelib or Eyedog Control Attack Detected
Windows Apache Batch File Execution Attack Detected
PHP-Nuke Remote File Copy Attack Detected
IIS RAD Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
Malformed HTR IDC or STM Query Attack Detected
Redundant Slashes in URI Attack Detected
IIS CGI Decode Command Execution Attack Detected
WebGais Remote Command Execution Attack Detected
UW POP2d FOLD Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
Lotus Domino Password Bypass Attack Detected
DNS NXT Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
DNS TSig Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
CDE Subprocess Control Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
SSH1 CRC32 Boundary Overflow Attack Detected
Windows RPC DCOM Buffer Overflow Attack Detected
Deep Throat DoS Client Traffic Detected
Trinoo DoS Daemon Handshake Traffic Detected
Outgoing Packet with Zero TTL Detected
Rare or Unknown IP Protocol Detected
Cisco IOS HTTP DoS Attack Detected

FastFormatter.condition: IDS LiveUpdate: IDS LiveUpdate process completed, (.*)

FastPattern.description: Everything Else (Should get caught by VR wrap)
